com.util.exception

Class ExceptionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.util.exception.ExceptionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ExceptionManager
extends Exception
    This class is responsible for handling all exceptions and take appropriate behavior.

    It defines log levels for each type of exception which can affect the log messages and handling. For example, a FATAL log will give a hint to exit the program. NOTE: Memory overhead used by this method can become quite ----- high as the exception list increases. Use only if you want automated handling and have enough memory.

    See Also:
